entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers early this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 20. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low 10.
